title: Mechanism and Regulation on Tensile-induced Degradation of Flexible Perovskite Solar Cells

Flexible perovskite solar cells (FPSCs) are promising next-generation photovoltaic devices, but the poor mechanical stability issue is still a huge obstacle to their commercialization. In this work, we investigate the...
